item.title: CVE-2021-36808|2024-08-04T01:01:59.233Z -- sophos -- sophos%20secure%20workspace%20for%20android
item.description: A local attacker could bypass the app password using a race condition in Sophos Secure Workspace for Android before version 9.7.3115.
